awards.description: Intel's judges will choose the one that interests them the most
awards.title: Intel's Choice

awards.description: Make your own stack Ex. raspberrylinuxnginxpostgrepythonpyramid
awards.title: Best Combo or Open Source Tech

awards.description: Build something cool Raspberry Pi or OpenWRT Device
awards.title: Coolest use of Raspberry Pi or OpenWRT Device

awards.description: Use Salesforce as a back end to fuel live data. Access data using any of the various Salesforce APIs. Bonus points will go to the app with a real world application and original business use case.
awards.title: Best use of Salesforce as a back end

awards.description: Solve a real world problem with your project. IBM Goodies include: A sling backpack, mp3 speaker, 8gb thumb drive, rectangle phone charger, and an IBM key chain
awards.title: Best solution to real-world problem

awards.description: What will you do with a gig Internet?
awards.title: Best app to demonstrate value of low latency and/or high capacity fiber

awards.description: Fitnet, fit.net, is a mobile fitness app.The app must include a scheduler and alerts. Most creative app which incorporates multiple motivators wins the prize.
awards.title: Build an app that will keep the user committed to workout days
